title: sankara guru varula
sahitya:
shankara guruvarula caraNa pankajamulu sAttvikamuga bhajimpavE manasA

anupallavi

 naga ananga adbhUta carituni shrngAramu jEsi janma mIDEra jEyu

caraNam

 citta shuddhamutO cintimpavE sadbhaktula cEri shrI praNatArthiharuni 
yuktAnukta upAyamu delisi vyaktamanucu shrI tyAgarAja vinuta
